title: S15 Ep41: Winged Cryptids: Monsters & Anomalous Creatures with Lon Strickler
itunes:title: Winged Cryptids: Monsters & Anomalous Creatures with Lon Strickler
description:
Darkness Radio is hunted by Winged Cryptids: Monsters & Anomalous Creatures with Lon Strickler with Lon Strickler

Lon Strickler has Over 30 years of research and investigations into strange phenomena having interviewed hundreds of first hand accounts. Today we discuss some of the most unusual creature sightings in the world and the creepy backstories and unbelievable encounters, including Lon's own sighting of a red-eyed winged, screaming humanoid creature and how it impacted him.

Get the book here: https://amazon.com

Visit his site here: https://www.phantomsandmonsters.com/
